about_the_game:
Warships: Final Battle is a turn-based naval battle game. The goal is to manage a fleet of combat vessels in such a way that you can fulfil the goals of your mission. Those can include something as straightforward as the complete annihilation of your enemies’ forces or something that requires a little more finesse, like making sure a ship convoy makes it safely through a map.



Or maybe you don't care and just want whoever's in your sights to go kablooey? Warships has got you covered with a variety of marine war machines to choose from. Whether it’s the smallest frigates to the bulkiest battleships, the composition of your very own armada determines how you can deal with enemy ships. Swarm them with a multitude of smaller ships or take all the hits with one big ship and blast ‘em with raw firepower.



Speaking of different ways to take out your opponent, the game allows you to customize you warship down to the smallest gun barrel. This involves a variety of weapons and defenses, each good in combination with a specific tactic, each good against a specific defensive armor or maneuver. Create your favorite setup and use it until you achieve victory! But your enemies will adept, so be ready to do the same when you need to.



The Warships campaign offers you a number of missions arranged into a story, but you can also challenge your friends to a fight in the game! Customize the battle’s settings, choose the best navy you can think of and sail on to victory!



Well, whatever’s your answer, we’re going for the latter. Warships is created with a charmingly cartoony and colorful art style in mind. Enjoy the sight of the vessels (whether you prefer them peacefully cruising on the waves or going up in fiery infernos) and the highly detailed game world that is the stage for your battles.


Take turns in the naval conflicts of Warships: Final Battle to see how your command plans play out. The weapons, armor, and even the size of your ship isn’t everything. The key to victory lies in successful tactics, so make sure to outmaneuver your opponent before they do the same to you!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Sound Card: Standard / Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590/AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • Sound Card: Standard / Integrated

short_description: Enter the exciting world of naval battles with Warships: Final Battle! Assemble a fleet of vessels ready for destruction and itching to obliterate your enemies. Command your ships in coastal raids or in grand naval battles. Play in a campaign or against live opponents.
